name: SpiritWalker
description: Shamans who have deepened their connection to the spirit world, able to walk between realms and channel greater spiritual powers with unprecedented control and understanding.

resource_systems.name: Mana
resource_systems.description: Mystical energy that powers spells and spiritual abilities
resource_systems.regeneration: 3 per 6 seconds, +5 when near natural elements or spirit anchors
mechanics: Mana points are spent to cast spells and invoke spiritual powers
Some abilities require maintaining focus, consuming mana over time
Communing with spirits in natural environments increases mana regeneration rate by 400%
Depleted mana causes penalties to spell effectiveness and spirit connection
Can channel mana into totems, spirit vessels, and dimensional anchors for persistent effects

resource_systems.name: Spirit Attunement
resource_systems.description: Connection to the spirit world that enhances spiritual abilities
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when communing with spirits, decreases when spirits are angered
mechanics: Increases by 15 when performing rituals honoring spirits
Increases by 10 per minute when in spiritually significant locations
Decreases by 15 when spirits are disrespected or dismissed
Decreases by 10 per minute when in spiritually corrupted areas
Can be spent to enhance spiritual abilities or summon powerful spirit allies

resource_systems.name: Planar Resonance
resource_systems.description: Harmony with the different planes of existence that allows for dimensional manipulation
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when traversing between planes or communing with extraplanar entities
mechanics: Increases by 10 when successfully traversing between planes
Increases by 5 when maintaining balance between different spiritual forces
Decreases by 10 when causing planar disruptions or imbalances
Decreases by 5 when remaining in a single plane for extended periods
Can be spent to open temporary portals or manipulate the boundaries between planes

class_mechanics.name: Spirit Walking
class_mechanics.description: Ability to project consciousness into the spirit realm while maintaining awareness in the physical world
effects: Can perceive both physical and spiritual realms simultaneously
Able to interact with spirits and spiritual phenomena directly
Can temporarily shift partially into the spirit realm to avoid physical dangers
Presence in the spirit realm is stronger and more influential
Can guide others on spiritual journeys and protect them from spiritual dangers

class_mechanics.name: Enhanced Elemental Communion
class_mechanics.description: Deeper connection to elemental forces allowing for greater control and power
effects: Can call upon multiple elemental powers simultaneously
Elemental abilities are significantly more powerful and controlled
Can perceive elemental imbalances across great distances
Able to temporarily transform parts of the body into elemental forms
Presence can dramatically alter local elemental conditions

class_mechanics.name: Spirit Binding
class_mechanics.description: Ability to form lasting bonds with spiritual entities for mutual benefit
effects: Can bind spirits to objects, locations, or willing creatures
Bound spirits provide ongoing benefits or perform specific tasks
Can maintain multiple spirit bindings simultaneously
Able to negotiate more favorable terms with powerful spirits
Can release bound spirits with appropriate ceremonies

class_mechanics.name: Ancestral Channel
class_mechanics.description: Direct channeling of ancestral spirits for guidance and power
effects: Can temporarily embody specific ancestral spirits for their abilities
Gain access to ancestral memories and knowledge with perfect recall
Ancestral spirits provide significant protection against spiritual and mental attacks
Can call upon the collective wisdom of ancestors for guidance
Presence strengthens ancestral connections for entire communities

skill_trees.name: Planar Traveler
skill_trees.focus: Movement between and manipulation of different planes of existence
key_abilities: Spirit Step: Briefly step completely into the spirit realm to avoid danger
Planar Anchor: Create a point that allows for easy return from spiritual journeys

skill_trees.name: Spirit Binder
skill_trees.focus: Formation of powerful bonds with spiritual entities
key_abilities: Greater Spirit Ally: Form a permanent bond with a powerful spirit companion
Spirit Vessel: Create objects that can house and channel specific spirits
Spiritual Convergence: Temporarily merge with a willing spirit for combined power

skill_trees.name: Elemental Harmony
skill_trees.focus: Mastery of elemental forces and their interactions
key_abilities: Elemental Fusion: Combine multiple elements for powerful hybrid effects
Elemental Attunement: Gain significant resistance to all elemental damage
Elemental Manifestation: Summon pure elemental entities to fight alongside you

advancement_requirements.skill_points: At least 5 points in any shaman skill tree
challenges: Maintain balance between opposing elemental forces

hero_classes.name: Theurgist
hero_classes.description: SpiritWalkers who have formed deep bonds with benevolent spirits and divine entities, channeling their power to heal, protect, and banish evil.

hero_classes.name: Soothsayer
hero_classes.description: SpiritWalkers who have developed the ability to perceive the threads of fate and destiny, gaining profound insights into past, present, and future events.

hero_classes.name: BloodCaller
hero_classes.description: SpiritWalkers who have turned to blood magic and alchemical potions, sacrificing traditional spellcasting for powerful combat abilities and automatic magical effects.

Allows for more controlled movement between planes

lore: SpiritWalkers represent shamans who have transcended the ordinary boundaries between the physical and spiritual realms, developing the extraordinary ability to exist in both simultaneously. Where ordinary shamans must perform elaborate rituals to commune with spirits, SpiritWalkers can perceive and interact with the spirit world as easily as breathing. This profound connection allows them to negotiate with more powerful spirits, channel greater elemental forces, and even temporarily step between different planes of existence. The path to becoming a SpiritWalker often involves a life-altering spiritual journey—sometimes called a 'spirit death'—where the shaman's consciousness is separated from their body and must navigate the treacherous spirit realm before returning forever changed. Those who succeed gain unprecedented spiritual awareness and control, while those who fail may be lost forever or return as hollow shells. SpiritWalkers serve as crucial mediators between mortal communities and the spirit world, maintaining the delicate balance between realms and ensuring that ancient pacts between mortals and spirits are honored. Some focus on healing spiritual ailments that conventional medicine cannot touch, while others protect communities from malevolent spiritual entities or elemental disasters. Their enhanced connection to ancestral spirits also makes them invaluable keepers of historical knowledge and cultural traditions. Whether they choose to deepen their connection with benevolent spirits, develop their ability to perceive the threads of fate, or turn to more controversial blood magic, all SpiritWalkers command respect from both the living and the dead.
